title: Top Cryptocurrency Stocks To Keep An Eye On – July 10th
description: Robinhood Markets, BIT Mining, BTCS, Bitdeer Technologies Group, Galaxy Digital, HIVE Digital Technologies, and BTC Digital are the seven Cryptocurrency stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat’s stock screener tool. Cryptocurrency stocks are equity shares in publicly traded companies whose core operations involve cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology—examples include Bitcoin‐mining firms, crypto exchanges, and blockchain developers.
